doc.after: The Macedonian period also included events of momentous religious significance The conversion of the Bulgarians Serbs and Rus to Orthodox Christianity permanently changed the religious map of Europe and still resonates today Cyril and Methodius two Byzantine Greek brothers from Thessaloniki contributed significantly to the Christianization of the Slavs and in the process devised the Glagolitic alphabet ancestor to the Cyrillic script 93
